articles.title: Asian Games 2023, Day 14 Highlights: Satwik-Chirag create history; gold in cricket & kabaddi, clean sweep in compound archery as India finish with 107 medals - The Indian Express
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Day 14 Highlights (October 07): The Indian contingent at Hangzhou 2023 touched the 100-medal mark on Saturday with the women's kabaddi team claiming a gold medal with a win over Chinese Taipei.
articles.content: To the beats of Dangal, Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy shook a leg on the court and the crowd joined them. To celebrate their historic men’s doubles gold medal, the two would rip their shi… [+780 chars]

articles.description: Asian Games 2023: Before the historic victory of team India in Kabaddi, the match was interrupted by a an-hour long drama that included protest, multiple reviews, and what not
articles.content: Asian Games 2023: Sit-in protest, multiple reviews, heated discussions, and a lot of drama occurred before India won its historic gold medal in Kabaddi on Saturday. All the drama began when a content… [+2644 chars]

articles.title: Hangzhou Asian Games: Indian men and women's chess teams clinch silver medals - Times of India
